nodes.text: The AM-Mk II was a model of construction droid utilized during the mid-Republic Era. During the time of the Galactic Civil War, the Veril Line Systems GT-series construction droid was the latest in a line of construction droids that dated back to the ancient AM-Mk II.
The AM-Mk II was mentioned in in Fully Operational, a 2018 sourcebook for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
